TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit UIPageViewControllerDataSource_Extensions extends System.Object

summary.para: Extension methods to the interface to support all the methods from the protocol.

remarks.para: The extension methods for allow developers to treat instances of the interface as having all the optional methods of the original protocol. Since the interface only contains the required members, these extension methods allow developers to call the optional members of the protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: public static nint GetPresentationCount (this UIKit.IUIPageViewControllerDataSource This, UIKit.UIPageViewController pageViewController);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype System.nint GetPresentationCount(class UIKit.IUIPageViewControllerDataSource This, class UIKit.UIPageViewController pageViewController) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance on which this extension method operates.
Docs.summary: The number of pages to be shown in the page indicator.

MemberSignature.Value: public static nint GetPresentationIndex (this UIKit.IUIPageViewControllerDataSource This, UIKit.UIPageViewController pageViewController);

Docs.param: The instance on which this extension method operates.
Docs.summary: The index of the page to be highlighted in the page indicator.
